abstract: The feature, free for Amazon Prime subscribers, has thousands of songs but does not include most new releases or the Universal Music Group catalog.
snippet: The feature, free for Amazon Prime subscribers, has thousands of songs but does not include most new releases or the Universal Music Group catalog.
lead_paragraph: Amazon introduced a music streaming feature on Thursday that gives subscribers to its Prime service access to thousands of songs free and without interruptions from advertising.

headline.main: Amazon Introduces New Music Streaming Service
